column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Okay , that part seems a little unbelievable . "
#Text=Varrick says : " This is no time for thinking , kid !
#Text=What about " Legion of Darkness " ?
#Text=Well , we 'll put a focus group on it .
#Text=Bolin teaches the airbenders to create a giant tornado .
#Text=Then he flies around in the sky , pushes Zaheer into it , turning him into wind , forever !
#Text=But Bolin does n't realize that the Universal Interplanetary Combination Zero - Hour — talk about a ticking clock — is almost upon him !
#Text=And when Juji shoots his laser eyes at the evil Unalaq , the beams accidentally fly into the magic spirit doorway !
#Text=They bounce off Vaatu , setting him free , and hit Bolin , turning him into a giant !
#Text=But when Vaatu is set free , the evil Unalaq , who has always been an annoyingly clingy person , is so close to Vaatu that they combine into one horrifying monster !
#Text=Giant Bolin and the evil UnaVaatu fight toe - to - toe , zapping each other with their laser beams as they stomp around Republic City !
#Text=It looks like the evil UnaVaatu might win !
#Text=But thankfully , Bolin 's spiritual mojo is so strong that he attracts the queen of the fairies !
#Text=With her help , Bolin turns UnaVaatu into magic dust and sprays him into the sky .
#Text=And that 's where the stars come from .
#Text=Oh yeah , and he turns into a dragon and he goes into the Spirit World and he saves the Avatar .
#Text=The end !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wait !
#Text=You like that ?
#Text=It did n't make any sense !
#Text=What about Zombie Amon ?
#Text=What happened to him , huh ?
#Text=And - and - and - and stars are magic fairy dust ?
#Text=Are you guys crazy ?
#Text=Are you crazy ?
#Text=" Baraz says : " It 's just a mover .
#Text=Do n't over-think it .
#Text=It 's like a ride .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Never let the truth get in the way of a good story , kid !
#Text="
